games.name: Monster Battleground
games.description: A Japanese style slot is coming. Player can get close to those cutie monsters by rolling your reel. Monsters would even evolve for the lucky master.

games.name: Robyn
games.description: All 243 ways pay in ROBYN. Robyn may win you a prize shooting TARGETs. Get Scatters to trigger 12 free spins with Wild Arrows feature!

games.name: Today's Weather
games.description: In Today’s Weather, our beloved forecast channel, experience the brand-new feature spins of Sunny, Snowy, Windy and Rainy weather with Big WINs!

games.name: Rolling Gold
games.description: Rolling Gold, our 5 x 4 game with a “Rolling” flow, will bring you fortune and happiness in its free games of genuine Chinese art-work.

games.name: Three Kingdoms
games.description: In the well-balanced 9-line game Three Kingdoms, enormous WINs are infused. With the Dragon’s roar, your destined prize waits in the unique bonus game!

games.name: Happy Farm
games.description: Run your own Happy Farm, here WINs pay both Left-to-Right and Right-to-Left. Get 3 Farm Houses and dig out the hidden treasure in Feature free spins!
Get the lucky 7s, win the gold. In this remake of the slot game classic, experience the fusion of vintage symbols in a series of feature games and multipliers.

games.name: Fruity Bites
games.description: Every spin is a sweetie juicy Fruity Bite! Find the favors you like in this kingdom of fruits and have a big bite in the feature fruity free spins!

games.name: Flamenco Dance
games.description: Come join the passionate dancers, in this romantic Flamenco Dance. Meet your partners of different characters in the feature with various multipliers.

games.name: GOA2
games.description: Glory of Ares II is a 5-Reel-3-Row game. Trigger the free spin bonus game with sticky wilds and bring back the bounties!

games.name: Opal Beauty
games.description: Staged in the opal mine of wealth, Opal Beauty Pays BOTH Left to Right and Right to Left, meaning more ways to win in the free spin feature!

games.name: King of Pirate
games.description: We pirate see, we pirate take. Hop on board sailors! Join the King of Pirate and his treasure hunt in a series of feature game with nice spins and multipliers.

games.name: Wild Rose
games.description: Castle, Sword and Roses under the Sun and the Moon. Be a noble in Wild Rose! May the splendid sword guide you to win in the feature spins.

games.name: Galaxy
games.description: Jump in this epic Sci-Fi world and harness the riches from the star crystals to trigger the free-spin feature which has a whole column of WILDs.
